comment: # после убийства демона обычные люди что были под майндконтролем выходят из него (возможно некоторые падают на пол или на колени, в общем их не хорошо)

languages.text: "Что... что это было?.. Помню только жуткий смех и мрак вокруг..."

traits.locale_text: "Что... что это было?.. Помню только жуткий смех и мрак вокруг..."

languages.text: "What... What was that just now? I only remember eerie laughter and darkness all around me..."
languages.original_text: "Что... что это было?.. Помню только жуткий смех и мрак вокруг..."

traits.locale_text: "What? What was I just... I remember strange laughter, and then — my head went empty..."
"What? What was I just... I remember strange laughter, and then — my head went empty..."
"What? What was I just... I remember strange laughter, and then — my head went empty..."
"What? What was I just... I remember strange laughter, and then — my head went empty..."
"What... What was that just now? I only remember eerie laughter and darkness all around me..."

languages.text: “刚刚……是怎么回事？我只记得听到了阴森的笑声，然后一切都变黑了……”
languages.original_text: "What... What was that just now? I only remember eerie laughter and darkness all around me..."

traits.locale_text: “刚刚……是怎么回事？我只记得听到了阴森的笑声，然后一切都变黑了……”

languages.text: «Qué... ¿Qué ha sido eso? Solo recuerdo una risa siniestra y que me rodeaba la oscuridad...».
languages.original_text: "What... What was that just now? I only remember eerie laughter and darkness all around me..."

traits.locale_text: «Qué... ¿Qué ha sido eso? Solo recuerdo una risa siniestra y que me rodeaba la oscuridad...».

languages.text: 「何…今のは何だ？覚えているのは不気味な笑い声と四方を包む暗闇だけだ…」
languages.original_text: "What... What was that just now? I only remember eerie laughter and darkness all around me..."

traits.locale_text: 「何…今のは何だ？覚えているのは不気味な笑い声と四方を包む暗闇だけだ…」

languages.text: "Was ... was war denn das? Ich erinnere mich nur an ein unheimliches Lachen und Dunkelheit überall ..."
languages.original_text: "What... What was that just now? I only remember eerie laughter and darkness all around me..."

traits.locale_text: "Was ... was war denn das? Ich erinnere mich nur an ein unheimliches Lachen und Dunkelheit überall ..."

languages.text: « Hein ? C'était quoi, ça ? Tout ce dont je me souviens, c'était des rires inquiétants et l'obscurité totale... »
languages.original_text: "What... What was that just now? I only remember eerie laughter and darkness all around me..."

traits.locale_text: « Hein ? C'était quoi, ça ? Tout ce dont je me souviens, c'était des rires inquiétants et l'obscurité totale... »

languages.text: "Ne... O da neydi öyle? Ürkünç kahkahalar duyduğumu ve etrafımın kapkaranlık olduğunu hatırlıyorum..."
languages.original_text: "What... What was that just now? I only remember eerie laughter and darkness all around me..."
